PerfectNetExp.abs: 中文名称: 公路工程土工合成材料塑料排水板(带) 英文名称:Geosynthetics in highway engineerings. Plastic drainboard中标分类:G32 ICS分类:93.080.10;83.120.
n. 滴水板同反义词同: [n.] draining board 英英解释名词解释: a board beside a kitchen sink and inclined to drain into the sink [同] drainboard.

entry.def: A drainboard is the same as a draining board .

means.word_mean: 1. a board beside a kitchen sink and inclined to drain into the sink

auth_sentence.content: He's hung a mirror above the sink and his shaving equipment and comb sit in a mug on the drainboard.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's hung a mirror above the sink and his shaving equipment and comb sit in a mug on the drainboard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's hung a mirror above the sink and his shaving equipment and comb sit in a mug on the drainboard.
